Title: Relates to requiring the use of project labor agreements for large scale construction projects under the state university construction fund
Summary: Relates to requiring the use of project labor agreements for large scale construction projects under the state university construction fund; provides exceptions to such requirement; provides that the fund may require every contractor become party to a project labor agreement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the use of project labor agreements for large scale construction projects under the state university construction fund
